instruction: got any intense drama movies about tough office competition?
output: If you're into high-stakes office drama with some serious tension, you’ve gotta check out Glengarry Glen Ross 🎬. It’s all about desperate real estate salesmen fighting to keep their jobs, with amazing performances from Al Pacino and Jack Lemmon. Super gripping and full of sharp dialogue! 🔥
